item.title: Setup Static Ip Address
item.description: Add following content to /etc/systemd/network/10-static.network The service systemd-networkd is required. [https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/systemd-networkd] [Match] Name=enp37s0 # may be wlan0 for wireless. Using ip addr to check [Network] DNS=0.0.0.0 Address=192.168.0.200/24 Gateway=192.168.0.255
